languages.text: "Этот корабль приписан к порту Даргонуса. Некоторое время назад капитан получил распоряжение срочно доставить посылку. Лично вам в руки, Ваша Светлость. Нам даже показали {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}пикт{/g} с вашим изображением". {n}Голос навигатора кажется спокойным. Но в его взгляде, нацеленном на вас, читается напряжение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Этот корабль приписан к порту Даргонуса. Некоторое время назад капитан получил распоряжение срочно доставить посылку. Лично вам в руки, Ваше Благородие. Нам даже показали {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}пикт{/g} с вашим изображением". {n}Голос навигатора кажется спокойным. Но в его взгляде, нацеленном на вас, читается напряжение.{/n}

languages.text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Этот корабль приписан к порту Даргонуса. Некоторое время назад капитан получил распоряжение срочно доставить посылку. Лично вам в руки, Ваша Светлость. Нам даже показали {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}пикт{/g} с вашим изображением". {n}Голос навигатора кажется спокойным. Но в его взгляде, нацеленном на вас, читается напряжение.{/n}

"This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the Captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, trained on you.{/n}

"This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a pict of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

"This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a pict of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

"This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

languages.text: 「この船はダルゴナスの港に配属されています。しばらく前、船長がある荷物を届けるよう指示されました。至急、陛下に手渡しするようにと。あなたの顔{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}写真{/g}まで見せられました」{n}航宙士の声は冷静そうだが、こちらを見つめる目には緊張感が宿っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この船はダルゴヌスの港に配属されています。しばらく前、船長がある荷物を届けるよう指示されました。至急、陛下に手渡しするようにと。あなたの顔の{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}ピクト{/g}まで見せられました」{n}航宙士の声は冷静そうだが、こちらを見つめる目には緊張感が宿っている。{/n}

languages.text: “这艘船被派遣至达戈努斯港。不久前，舰长奉命运送一个包裹，客户迫切想要我们亲手将这个包裹送到您手中，大人。客户甚至还给了我们一份关于您的{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}视讯记录{/g}。”{n}汉恩的声音似乎很平静，但他的双眼正紧张地盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这艘船被派遣至达戈努斯港。不久前，舰长奉命运送一个包裹，客户迫切想要我们亲手将这个包裹送到您手中，大人。客户甚至还给了我们一份关于您的{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}视讯记录{/g}。”{n}汉恩的声音似乎很平静，但他的双眼正紧张地盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: «Esta nave está asignada al puerto de Dargonus. Hace un tiempo, el capitán recibió órdenes de transportar un paquete. La entrega debía ser en mano e iba dirigido a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Incluso recibimos una {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}imagen{/g} de su cara». {n}La voz del Navegante parece tranquila, pero te mira fijamente con ojos tensos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta nave está asignada al puerto de Dargonus. Hace un tiempo, el capitán recibió órdenes de transportar un paquete. La entrega debía ser en mano e iba dirigido a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Incluso recibimos una {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}imagen{/g} de su cara». {n}La voz del Navegante parece tranquila, pero te mira fijamente con ojos tensos.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce vaisseau est affecté au port de Dargonus. Voilà quelque temps, notre capitaine a reçu l'ordre de livrer un colis, de toute urgence et en mains propres... à vous-même, Votre Seigneurie. On nous a même montré une {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pictocapture{/g} de votre visage. » {n}La voix du navigateur semble calme, mais la tension est visible dans le regard qu'il pose sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce vaisseau est affecté au port de Dargonus. Voilà quelque temps, notre capitaine a reçu l'ordre de livrer un colis, de toute urgence et en mains propres... à vous-même, Votre Seigneurie. On nous a même montré une {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pictocapture{/g} de votre visage. » {n}La voix du navigateur semble calme, mais la tension est visible dans le regard qu'il pose sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: "Das Schiff ist im Hafen von Dargonus registriert. Vor einiger Zeit erhielt der Captain die Anweisung, ein Paket auszuliefern. Dringend und persönlich – an Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Uns wurde sogar ein {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}Vid{/g} von Eurem Gesicht gezeigt." {n}Die Stimme des Navigators klingt ruhig, doch in seinem auf dich fixierten Blick liegt Anspannung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das Schiff ist im Hafen von Dargonus registriert. Vor einiger Zeit erhielt der Captain die Anweisung, ein Paket auszuliefern. Dringend und persönlich – an Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Uns wurde sogar ein {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}Vid{/g} von Eurem Gesicht gezeigt." {n}Die Stimme des Navigators klingt ruhig, doch in seinem auf dich fixierten Blick liegt Anspannung.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu gemi, Dargonus limanında görevliydi. Bir süre önce kaptanımıza bir teslimat yapması talimatı verildi. Acil, elden teslim edilmesi gereken, size ulaştırılacak bir teslimat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bize yüzünüzün bir {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}foto{/g}su bile gösterildi." {n}Rotacı'nın sesi kulağa oldukça sakin gelse de sana kilitlenmiş gözlerindeki gerginliği okuyabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This ship is assigned to the port of Dargonus. Some time ago, the captain was instructed to deliver a package. Urgently, by hand — to you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We were even shown a {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} of your face." {n}The Navigator's voice seems calm. Yet there is tension in his eyes, which are trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu gemi Dargonus limanında görevliydi. Bir süre önce kaptana bir teslimat yapması talimatı verildi. Acil, elden teslim edilmesi gereken, size ait bir teslimat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bize sizin yüzünüzün bir {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}foto{/g}su bile gösterildi." {n}Rotacı'nın sesi kulağa oldukça sakin geliyor ancak sana kilitlenmiş gözlerinde okunan bir gerginlik var.{/n}
